languages.text: "Соберись с духом, Идира. Нам предстоит нелегкая битва".
"Pull yourself together, Idira. We have a tough battle ahead of us."
languages.original_text: "Соберись с духом, Идира. Нам предстоит нелегкая битва".

traits.locale_text: "Pull yourself together, Idira. We have a tough battle ahead of us."
"Pull yourself together, Idira. We have a tough battle ahead of us."
"Pull yourself together, Idira. We have a tough battle ahead of us."
"Pull yourself together, Idira. We have a tough battle ahead of us."
"Pull yourself together, Idira. We have a tough battle ahead of us."

languages.text: “打起精神来，伊迪拉。咱们还有一场硬仗要打呢。”
languages.original_text: "Pull yourself together, Idira. We have a tough battle ahead of us."

traits.locale_text: “打起精神来，伊迪拉。咱们还有一场硬仗要打呢。”

languages.text: «Cálmese, Idira. Nos espera una dura batalla».
languages.original_text: "Pull yourself together, Idira. We have a tough battle ahead of us."

traits.locale_text: «Cálmese, Idira. Nos espera una dura batalla».

languages.text: 「イディラ、落ち着くんだ。この先には激しい戦闘が待ち構えているんだ」
languages.original_text: "Pull yourself together, Idira. We have a tough battle ahead of us."

traits.locale_text: 「イディラ、落ち着くんだ。この先には激しい戦闘が待ち構えているんだ」

languages.text: "Reißt Euch zusammen, Idira. Uns steht ein schwerer Kampf bevor."
languages.original_text: "Pull yourself together, Idira. We have a tough battle ahead of us."

traits.locale_text: "Reißt Euch zusammen, Idira. Uns steht ein schwerer Kampf bevor."

languages.text: « Reprenez-vous, Idira. C'est un rude combat qui nous attend. »
languages.original_text: "Pull yourself together, Idira. We have a tough battle ahead of us."

traits.locale_text: « Reprenez-vous, Idira. C'est un rude combat qui nous attend. »

languages.text: "Topla kendini İdira. Bizi çetin bir savaş bekliyor."
languages.original_text: "Pull yourself together, Idira. We have a tough battle ahead of us."
